text: Paul Burmeister (born March 10, 1971) is an analyst for the NFL Network. He hosts shows like College Scoreboard, Path to the Draft and Playbook. Burmeister was an American football quarterback at the University of Iowa. He led his team to the Alamo Bowl. He was a throwing quarterback at the 1994 NFL Scouting Combine. Before he worked for the NFL Network, Burmeister was a sports anchor for KWWL in Waterloo, Iowa. There, he worked with Rick Coleman and Chris Kolkhorst. ==References== ==Other websites== * Iowa Hawkeyes football bio Category:Sportspeople from Iowa Category:People from Waterloo, Iowa Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:American television personalities Category:People from Iowa City, Iowa
title: Paul Burmeister
